revised_title: Improving the Indicator Method for Measuring Coefficients of Diffusion in Gels
tldr: The authors developed an improved indicator method for measuring coefficients of diffusion in gels, focusing on the diffusion of chlorides. They used a substance called an indicator, which reacts with the diffusing substance and makes the process visible. This method allows for easier and more accurate measurements of diffusion in gels, which are important in understanding various physiological processes.
